channel.title: Control panel help
channel.description: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,449507.msg3297953.html#msg3297953]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,449507.msg3297953.html#msg3297953[/url] the link above a tutorial on how to add a control panel, yet its hard to follow.....He tells me to put this code in the GUI which I thought it meant the client area, but that made no sense, yet it is my only GUI I have. But also at the same time it called for playerhandler.java which would be in my source, yet I don't have a GUI.java in my source, so I'm a little confuse on what to do. I'm not sure where to the code he is giving me, so you guys think you can help me out?

item.title: Control panel help
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:2, topic:517875”][/quote]
source folder
well i created a ControlPanel.java
and placed the code got these two things saying can’t find symbol

Read full topic

item.title: Control panel help
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“MrFun, post:5, topic:517875”][quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=636139.msg4288900#msg4288900 date=1366864736]

Wrong section. I’d help if you were smart enough to make a class named Gui.java, but looks like we’re both screwed.

you are saying make a GUI.java in the source folder? btw I don’t know if this follows under client help or source help because the guy doesn’t say where to put the codes at all I can say he has the code looking like it belongs in the client part, yet its a server panel thou so im confused on where this guy wants me to put it
[/quote]He CLEARLY says how to add it, and by the looks of where the tutorial is, you can determine where the tutorial was posted.

  1. create a new class
  2. copy the code
  3. get two errors
    :o doesn’t help[/quote]Doesn’t help you because you’re doing it wrong. Also, post your errors. We can’t help if we don’t know the problem…

Read full topic
